name: ArtGem Project File
summary: Learn about .AGP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ArtGem was was sold as a shareware program between 1999 and 2002, but was discontinued due to lack of registrations.

description:
An AGP file is a 32-bit image file with multiple layers. It is created with the ArtGem software that provides the features of working with images and is similar to Adobe Photoshop in basic features. AGP is a project file that contains all the settings for creating the final image.

AGP files could be opened with RL Vision ArtGem. However, ArtGem has long been discontinued after getting sold.
32-bit layered image file created with ArtGem; includes editing features similar to Photoshop, but uses a more basic interface; supports paint tools, selections, multiple undos, and filters.
